content: खंड {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [खंड्-घञ्] {@--1@} Broken, divided, torn asunder; °देवकुलं <ls>Pt. 2</ls> a temple in ruins. {@--2@} Having chasms, gaps or breaks. {@--3@} Defective, deficient. --डः, --डं {@--1@} A break, chasm, gap, fissure, fracture. {@--2@} A piece, part, fragment, portion; दिवः कांतिमत्खंडमेकं <ls>Me. 30</ls>; काष्ठ°, मांस° &c. {@--3@} A section of a work, chapter. {@--4@} A multitude, an assemblage, group; तरुखंडस्य <ls>K. 23</ls>; <ls>Māl. 5. 23</ls>, <ls n="Māl.">8. 10.</ls> {@--5@} A term in an equation. --डः {@--1@} Candied sugar. {@--2@} A flaw in a jewel. --डं {@--1@} A kind of salt. {@--2@} A sort of sugar-cane. (In <ab>comp.</ab> खंड means ‘partial,’ ‘incomplete’).
